paper_abstract: This paper proposes a construction method of binary Z-periodic complementary sequence set (Z-PCSs) based on binary aperiodic complementary sequence pair (Golay pair) and interleaved technique. The constructed set is optimal or almost optimal with respect to the theoretical bound in different conditons. The set can be used in multi-carrier code division multiple access communication systems. The designed sequence has periodic complementary characteristics, which lead to a strong ability to resist multi-path interference and multiple access interference.
paper_title: Construction of Z-Periodic Complementary Sequence Based on Interleaved Technique
